meta.videoTitle: Science-Supported Tools to Accelerate Your Fitness Goals

title_zh: 工具3：“甘蔗” 耐久性协议

paragraphList.text_en: The “Sugarcane” Endurance Protocol is a crucial tool in the realm of fitness and strength training. When focusing on improving endurance and strength, particularly muscular endurance, following this protocol can have significant benefits. By engaging in the Sugarcane Endurance Protocol, individuals can not only maintain their existing strength levels but also have the potential to enhance their strength over time. This process helps counteract the natural decline that may typically occur with lack of targeted training.
paragraphList.text_zh: “甘蔗”耐力协议在健身和力量训练领域中是一种至关重要的工具。在专注于提高耐力和力量，特别是肌肉耐力时，遵循该协议可以带来显著的好处。通过参与“甘蔗”耐力协议，个人不仅可以维持其现有的力量水平，还有可能随着时间的推移增强他们的力量。这个过程有助于抵消由于缺乏有针对性的训练而可能发生的自然衰退。

paragraphList.text_en: In the world of fitness and wellness, it is essential to pay attention to not only physical exercise routines but also to nutritional supplementation. A notable sponsor in this field is Athletic Greens, now known as AG1, which offers a comprehensive vitamin, mineral, and probiotic drink. This product caters to fulfilling foundational nutritional requirements, making it a valuable addition to one's wellness regimen.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在健身和健康的世界中，不仅要关注身体锻炼计划，还要注重营养补充。这个领域中一个著名的赞助商是Athletic Greens，现在被称为AG1，他们提供全面的维生素、矿物质和益生菌饮料。这款产品满足基本营养需求，是一个有价值的补充，可以加入到一个人的健康计划中。

paragraphList.text_en: Athletic Greens is a popular choice among individuals seeking to enhance their health and well-being. It provides essential probiotics that are beneficial for gut health, which in turn impacts various biological systems in our bodies. The gut is home to a plethora of gut microbiota that play a crucial role in communicating with the brain, immune system, and other biological processes. By ensuring optimal gut health through probiotics like those found in Athletic Greens, individuals can positively influence their immediate and long-term health outcomes.
paragraphList.text_zh: Athletic Greens 是许多追求增进健康和福祉的个人之间的流行选择。它提供了有益于肠道健康的必需益生菌，这反过来影响我们身体中的各种生物系统。肠道是各种肠道微生物的家园，这些微生物在与大脑、免疫系统和其他生物过程的沟通中发挥着至关重要的作用。通过确保通过类似于Athletic Greens中发现的益生菌的最佳肠道健康，个人可以积极地影响其即时和长期健康状况。

paragraphList.text_en: In addition to probiotics, Athletic Greens also offers a blend of adaptogens, vitamins, and minerals that cater to fulfilling foundational nutritional needs. This combination ensures that the body receives essential nutrients to support overall health and performance. Moreover, Athletic Greens is known for its pleasant taste, making it a convenient and enjoyable option for those looking to boost their nutritional intake.
paragraphList.text_zh: 除了益生菌之外，Athletic Greens还提供了一种混合适应原、维生素和矿物质的配方，满足基本营养需求。这种组合确保身体获得支持整体健康和表现所需的基本营养素。此外，Athletic Greens以其口感宜人而闻名，使其成为那些希望增加营养摄入的人方便且令人愉悦的选择。

paragraphList.text_en: For those interested in trying Athletic Greens, the company provides an opportunity to experience its benefits firsthand. By visiting athleticgreens.com/huberman, individuals can receive five free travel packs of Athletic Greens, making it convenient to incorporate into their routine, even while on the go. Additionally, those who take advantage of this offer will also receive a year's supply of vitamin D3K2, further enhancing their nutritional profile.
paragraphList.text_zh: 对于有兴趣尝试Athletic Greens的人来说，该公司提供了一个机会让他们第一手体验其好处。通过访问athleticgreens.com/huberman，个人可以获得五个免费的Athletic Greens旅行包，方便他们在忙碌之余将其融入日常生活中。此外，利用该优惠的人还将获得一年的维生素D3K2补给，进一步增强其营养需求。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, by incorporating the “Sugarcane” Endurance Protocol into one's fitness routine and complementing it with products like Athletic Greens, individuals can optimize their overall health and wellness. Through a holistic approach that combines targeted training methodologies with high-quality nutritional supplementation, individuals can work towards achieving their fitness goals and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总的来说，将“甘蔗”耐力协议纳入个人的健身日常，并结合像Athletic Greens这样的产品，个人可以优化其整体健康和健康状况。通过将有针对性的训练方法与高质量的营养补充相结合的整体方法，个人可以努力实现其健身目标并保持健康的生活方式。
